        ~Note that <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|file~_exists>> behaves similarly to
        [[http://caml.inria.fr/pub/docs/manual-ocaml/libref/Sys.html#VALfile_exists|

* "file" is interpreted as "directory entry" in this context
